argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_rdgdmlim | |- Lim dom rec ( F , A ) |
| 2 |  | #P_limomss | |- ( Lim dom rec ( F , A ) -> _om C_ dom rec ( F , A ) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_ax-mp | |- _om C_ dom rec ( F , A ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_sseli | |- ( B e. _om -> B e. dom rec ( F , A ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_rdgsucg | |- ( B e. dom rec ( F , A ) -> ( rec ( F , A ) ` suc B ) = ( F ` ( rec ( F , A ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_syl | |- ( B e. _om -> ( rec ( F , A ) ` suc B ) = ( F ` ( rec ( F , A ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_peano2b | |- ( B e. _om <-> suc B e. _om ) |
| 8 |  | #P_fvres | |- ( suc B e. _om -> ( ( rec ( F , A ) |` _om ) ` suc B ) = ( rec ( F , A ) ` suc B ) ) |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_sylbi | |- ( B e. _om -> ( ( rec ( F , A ) |` _om ) ` suc B ) = ( rec ( F , A ) ` suc B ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_fvres | |- ( B e. _om -> ( ( rec ( F , A ) |` _om ) ` B ) = ( rec ( F , A ) ` B ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( B e. _om -> ( F ` ( ( rec ( F , A ) |` _om ) ` B ) ) = ( F ` ( rec ( F , A ) ` B ) ) ) |
| 12 | 6, 9, 11 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( B e. _om -> ( ( rec ( F , A ) |` _om ) ` suc B ) = ( F ` ( ( rec ( F , A ) |` _om ) ` B ) ) ) |
